title: Ep 104: Two Loud Women Walk Into A Podcast With El Cholo's Kid Daisy Romero
itunes:title: Ep 104: Two Loud Women Walk Into A Podcast With El Cholo's Kid Daisy Romero
itunes:subtitle: This was going to be the Christmas Eve ep, but we saved it for the last episode of 2021 because it's so good.
description:
El Cholo’s Kid bags have been on our gift guides for two years and now founder and designer Daisy Romero FINALLY JOINS for an episode! The last one of 2021! It was supposed to air on Christmas Eve but I wanted to save it to close out the year with a bang. If you haven’t checked out El Cholo’s Kid bags, oh my GOD what are you waiting for? Daisy is here to talk Christmas decor, her favorite collabs (often served to her in Instagram ads), therapy, and starting her own business. She rules. This is officially a Daisy Romero fan club.


El Cholo’s Kid: https://www.elcholoskid.com/ (PS. Try code GEETHANKS for 20% off your order – limited time only!)


Gee Thanks! is powered by subscribers like you! To keep all of our Gee Thanks! content free and accessible to all, consider making a monthly donation of $2 to keep us going. 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
